mng: can, to be possible, to be able to, will, to be likely to, to be sure to, to assemble, to meet, to gather, to see, union, group, association, a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

exm.mng: can, to be possible, to be able to, will, to be likely to, to be sure to, to assemble, to meet, to gather, to see, union, group, association, a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to balance an account, accountancy, accounting
a guild, (in olden times) an association such as a political party, religious group or trade guild, the Japanese word for company
improbable, unlikely, will not (act, happen etc), not able, not having learned to do sth, (coll.) (Tw) don't mention it, not at all
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to), will (cause), should (enable), going to
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?, is able to or not
a moment, a while, in a moment, also pr. [yi1 hui3]
Japanese limited company, corporation, public company, Ltd, p.l.c., Corp, Japanese pr. kabushiki-gaisha
to learn, to master, institute, learned society, (scholarly) association
